page.title: 08Education in Annan
page.content: Young people can receive about fifteen years of full-time education within the town of Annan. From the age of about 3 there is a {Nursery School,}or else a number of pre-school playgroups run by volunteers. There are four{Primary Schools catering for the 5 to 12 year olds : Elmvale, Hecklegirth and Newington are nondenominational schools, and St.Columba's is a Roman Catholic Primary School. Annan Academy is a large 1300 pupil {Secondary School}where pupils start at around 12 and can leave at 16, 17 or 18. Adult education is provided at {evening classes}in the Community Education Centre. All of the above centres are run by {Dumfries and Galloway Regional Council
